name: Gura Gura no Mi
description: The Gura Gura no Mi is one of the most powerful Paramecia-type Devil Fruits, allowing the user to create powerful shockwaves and vibrations, earning it the reputation as the fruit that can 'destroy the world'.
weaknesses: Requires significant physical strength to use effectively
history: This fruit was first used by Edward Newgate (Whitebeard), who was considered the strongest man in the world. After his death, it was stolen by Marshall D. Teach (Blackbeard).
